headline: Is Disney’s (DIS) Earnings Surge and Theme Park Expansion Shifting Its Long-Term Investment Case?
summary: The Walt Disney Company recently reported fourth quarter and full-year earnings, showing a sharp rise in net income to US$1.31 billion for the quarter and US$12.40 billion for the full year, alongside revenue of US$22.46 billion and US$94.43 billion, respectively. An interesting development is Disney's continued investment in expanding its theme park and cruise operations, supported by substantial share buybacks and the rollout of new original streaming content such as the planned "Far Cry"...

content.title: Is Disney’s (DIS) Earnings Surge and Theme Park Expansion Shifting Its Long-Term Investment Case?
content.summary: The Walt Disney Company recently reported fourth quarter and full-year earnings, showing a sharp rise in net income to US$1.31 billion for the quarter and US$12.40 billion for the full year, alongside revenue of US$22.46 billion and US$94.43 billion, respectively. An interesting development is Disney's continued investment in expanding its theme park and cruise operations, supported by substantial share buybacks and the rollout of new original streaming content such as the planned "Far Cry"...
